title: Citi Opens New Branch in Guatemala City

tag-1: Citi Opens New Branch in Guatemala City
tag-2: Guatemala City – Citi Guatemala has opened a new branch in Guatemala City, which will serve more than 5,500 customers. Located at Portales Mall in Carretera Al Atlántico zona, 17 Plaza Financiera, the branch is open Monday to Friday from 9 a.m. to 6 p.m. and on Saturdays from 9 a.m. to 1 p.m.
tag-3: "This new branch is intended to expand the presence of Citi in Guatemala while providing solutions for businesses and personal banking needs," said Ruben Gross, Head of Consumer Bank, Citi Guatemala. The branch will provide daily transactions such as deposits, utility payments, cash withdrawals, check payments, credit cards, loan applications and CitiPhone service for quick customer inquiries.
tag-4: In addition, personnel at the branch will open savings and checking accounts as well as business and personal loans, credit cards, credicheque, foreign exchange and many other financial products. The branch has four tellers and four customer service representatives who can meet the needs of Citibank customers in a comfortable and secure environment.
tag-5: The Portales Mall belongs to the department store chain that owns Oakland Mall and Miraflores, enabling our Citi Spectrum clients to take advantage of these added benefits: cash back, merchant discounts, free one-year parking and free membership.
tag-6: "The staff at the new Citi branch will personally address all customers' needs, providing prompt and efficient world-class banking service. In 2012, Citi will continue to grow in the country, restructuring its branches and work to build close and lasting relationships with its customers," said Gross.
tag-7: In addition to Citibank branches, Citi Guatemala offers customers Super Sencillo Agencies and Pronet Points so they can promptly make credit card payments year-round. Customers can also use electronic banking at www.citi.com.gt.
tag-8: Citi Citi, the leading global financial services company, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.
